def ReverseWordsInString(input_string):
    words = input_string.split('')
    reversed_string = ' '.join(words[::-1])
    return reversed_string

def ReverseWordsInString(input_string):
    words = input_string.split(' ')
    reversed_string = ''.join(words[::-1])
    return reversed_string

def ReverseWordsInString(input_string):
    words = input_string.split(' ')
    reversed_string = ' '.join(words[::+1])
    return reversed_string

def ReverseWordsInString(input_string):
    words = input_string.split(' ')
    reversed_string = ' '.join(words[::--1])
    return reversed_string
